```{r setup}
library(ezGenomeTracks)
```

`ezGenomeTracks` provides functions to interact with `TxDb` objects, map gene ID to symbols and plot genes.

## Set up data

```{r}
library(org.Hs.eg.db)
library(TxDb.Hsapiens.UCSC.hg38.knownGene)

txdb <- TxDb.Hsapiens.UCSC.hg38.knownGene
```

## Plot genes with `ez_gene`

```{r, fig.height=1}
geneRegion <- "chr10:6,012,410-6,063,160"

ez_gene(data = txdb, geneRegion)
```

## Advanced usage

Extracting gene information from a `TxDb` object can be slow. Alternatively, you can use functions provided in the package to extract gene information from a given region, and use the output data frame for plotting.

```{r, fig.height=1}
geneRegion <- "chr10:6,012,410-6,063,160"
geneDf <- ezGenomeTracks:::extract_txdb_data(
  txdb,
  region_gr = ezGenomeTracks::parse_region(geneRegion)
)

ez_gene(data = geneDf, geneRegion)
```
